definition: suffix of a noun of locality
erhua variant of 後邊|后边[hou4 bian5]

sentences.english: The red marks of the wings and tail's projections are the characteristics of spangle .
sentences.chinese: 黑凤蝶的特点是红色的花纹和翅膀后边儿有突起。

sentences.english: At the centre of this wing is the famous balcony, with the Centre Room behind its glass doors.
sentences.chinese: 这个翼的中心是著名的楼厅，中央厅则在玻璃门后边。

sentences.english: He and Wray were crouched behind a hedgerow.
sentences.chinese: 他与沃伊中尉蹲伏在一道树篱后边。

sentences.english: She met Oberon attended by his train of fairy courtiers.
sentences.chinese: 她遇见奥布朗，后边还跟着仙宫的侍臣。

sentences.english: I crawled down between the gondola and the shelter of the high freight-car behind.
sentences.chinese: 我爬到“平底船”和后边一节高高的货车的车檐间。

sentences.english: You should use two spaces after a sentence-ending period.
sentences.chinese: 应该在句尾的句号后边加上两个空格。

sentences.english: I should say is in behind, and listen to come.
sentences.chinese: 我要说的重点在后边，且听道来。

sentences.english: I sit behind Lin Tao in the class.
sentences.chinese: 正在班上，我坐正在洪涛后边。

sentences.english: It’s getting late, so we decide to head back to the hotel, which sits behind the barricade.
sentences.chinese: 天色已晚，我们决定回路障后边的旅馆。

sentences.english: With woman steps she followed: the ruffian and his strolling mort .
sentences.chinese: 她迈着女性的步子跟在后边，恶棍和共闯江湖的姘头。

sentences.english: “It was good to see Robin, ” I continued from the back.
sentences.chinese: “看到了罗宾真好，”我坐在后边继续说。

sentences.english: And on the playground behind the building, only the wind plays on the swing.
sentences.chinese: 在公寓楼后边的游戏场上，玩秋千的只有一阵阵的风。

sentences.english: I rounded the hut and saw a man's dead body sprawling in the mud.
sentences.chinese: 我绕到竹屋的后边，看到一个男人的尸体躺在泥中。

sentences.english: Do not stand behind rig tongs while they are in use.
sentences.chinese: 上卸扣时，不能站在大钳的后边。

sentences.english: Let's try knocking at the back door.
sentences.chinese: 咱们敲敲后边的门试试。

sentences.english: He’ll keep you steady by holding your hips firmly, as he thrusts from behind.
sentences.chinese: 他则牢牢托住你的臀部以让你稳定，而从后边进入。

definition: left/the left side/to the left of
the top/above/overhead/upwards/the top margin/above-mentioned/those higher up
to open up a path/to make one's way through/to construct a road/(electricity) open circuit
